message: Removed all Streamlit/UI references from docs and scripts, verified no legacy/ dir, confirmed requirements.txt contains no streamlit/plotly/pandas, and ensured agents are defined and started.

changes.summary: Docstring updated to remove UI mention.
Removed dashboards wording; replaced with headless reporting.
Reworded UI/dashboard recommendations to headless observability.
Replaced dashboard phrasing with headless status.
Replaced 'monitoring dashboard' recommendation with headless monitoring.
Replaced 'from UI to machine' with 'from control channel to machine'.
Notes updated to avoid Streamlit/UI references.
Comment updated to remove Streamlit reference.
Comments updated to avoid Streamlit reference.
